author: Martin Wall
title: Coronavirus: Public urged to stay at home for Easter
description: Childcare scheme for health workers being discussed as 16 more patients die
content:
The public has been urged to stay home for Easter and avoid unnecessary travel in order to limit the spread of coronavirus.
Chief medical officer Dr Tony Holohan on Monday night said people with second homes should not travel to them for the bank holiday wee… [+2694 chars]
